comment.author: 72133717@N05
comment._content: According to 1901 Census he was born in 1894 in Hammersmith London and lived at 15 Luxemburg Gardens, Hammersmith with his parents Richard W and Beatrice Batho and his brother Edgar R who was born in 1895. There was also a cook and a domestic nurse living in the house.

comment.author: 69679868@N03
comment._content: Lieutenant John Batho RE was seriously wounded on the Bethune Front on 27th September 1915, he was evacuated to the Casualty Clearing Station near the village of Chocques behind the lines, where he died of his wounds.
